import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create new game"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/create-new-game"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this request to create a new game. It registers new `demo` or `real` game on the server and returns the Launcher URL
for the game. You can redirect the user to this URL to start playing the game or open it in iFrame.
Read more about Launcher URL in the [Launcher URL](#laucher-url) section.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-REQUEST-SIGN","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Request signature (read more in the Authentication section)","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["cID","extCID","gameID","demo","returnURL","platform","currency","locale"],"properties":{"cID":{"description":"Client's ID. It's provided by Swipe Games and is used as your identifier.\n","type":"string","format":"uuid"},"extCID":{"description":"External Client's ID (client/platform/game aggregator/integrator or casino on your side). This is provided from your side, and this is\nhow you identify your clients. We use it in all callbacks to you.\n","type":"string"},"gameID":{"description":"Game's ID. This is Swipe Games's game identifier. See the list of supported games in `Game IDs` section.\n","type":"string"},"sessionID":{"description":"Session ID (game integrator or casino).This is your Session ID. We use\nit in all callbacks to you. Not required for demo games, since we don't use callbacks for demo games.\n","type":"string"},"returnURL":{"description":"Return URL which we could use to redirect the user after the game is finished/exited. If you don't provide this URL, return button in the game will be disabled. Please make sure you provide this URL when using redirect to open the game, otherwise player cannot","type":"string"},"currency":{"description":"Currency code in ISO4217.","type":"string"},"locale":{"description":"Locale code in IIETF BCP 47 (ISO 639).","type":"string"},"platform":{"description":"Platform code. This is used to identify the platform where the game is launched.","type":"string","enum":["desktop","mobile"]},"demo":{"description":"Demo mode. If true, the game will be launched in demo mode (means no callbacks will be fired on your side,\nand we use our demo balance for the game). If false, the game will be launched in real mode.\n","type":"boolean"},"user":{"description":"User information we show in the game. User should be provided for real game.\n","x-go-type":"User","type":"object","required":["id"],"properties":{"id":{"description":"User's ID (external for real game, internal for demo game).","type":"string"},"firstName":{"type":"string"},"lastName":{"type":"string"},"nickName":{"type":"string"},"country":{"description":"Country code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.","type":"string"}},"title":"User"}},"title":"CreateNewGameRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"ok","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["gameURL","gameSessionID"],"properties":{"gameURL":{"type":"string"},"gameSessionID":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"title":"CreateNewGameResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Wrong signature or API key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Common error response for Swipe Games Public API.","type":"object","required":["message","details"],"properties":{"message":{"description":"A brief description of the error in English. Could be shown to the user.","type":"string"},"details":{"description":"Technical details for the error. Could be used for debugging, should not be shown to the user.","type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"Server error occurred","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Common error response for Swipe Games Public API.","type":"object","required":["message","details"],"properties":{"message":{"description":"A brief description of the error in English. Could be shown to the user.","type":"string"},"details":{"description":"Technical details for the error. Could be used for debugging, should not be shown to the user.","type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
